Multilingual UTF-8 Characters Test

==================================

Language Samples

----------------

English: Hello World

Spanish: ¡Hola! ¿Cómo estás?

French: Bonjour. Ça va ?

Russian: Привет. Как дела?

German: Guten Tag. Wie geht’s?

Arabic: مرحبا بالعالم

Hebrew: שלום עולם

Chinese (Simplified): 你好 世界

Japanese:こんにちは

------------------------------

Common Typographic Symbols

------------------------------

Dashes:

  - Hyphen: -

  - En dash: –

  - Em dash: —

  - Long dash: ——  

Quotes:

  - “Double quotes”

  - ‘Single quotes’

Punctuation & Marks:

  - Ellipsis: …

  - Middle dot: ·

  - Bullet: •

  - Section: §

  - Copyright: ©

  - Trademark: ™

  - Registered: ®

Math & Symbols:

  - Not equal: ≠

  - Plus-minus: ±

  - Infinity: ∞

  - Degree: °

  - Arrow: →
